comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Checks to see whether it is valid to place the specified block type or block permutation, on a specified face on this block

comments.name: param
comments.value: Block type or block permutation to check placement for.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Optional specific face of this block to check placement against.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns `true` if the block type or permutation can be placed on this block, else `false`.
